tiles.text: Application development for Android, network or desktop. Animation creation with the newest technologies.

tiles.title: Animation
tiles.text: Application development for Android, network or desktop. Animation creation with the newest technologies.

tiles.title: Frameworks
tiles.text: Well-proven, popular frameworks: Drupal, Moodle, Wordpress installation, design, plugin and feature development. Optimalisation, or upgrading.

tiles.title: E-learning
tiles.text: Professional e-learning contents supporting the SCORM and the WCAG standards, that can be used in frameworks or as stand alone contents as well.

tiles.title: Agile
tiles.text: Working in an agile view, organise or coach this way of working. On the other hand, I can teach any of the mentioned technologies in a professional level.

tiles.title: Data handling
tiles.text: Organise manipulate or create data in a relational or non relational database like SQL or MongoDB. Develop the structure of the database or the data models. Documentation with the UML standard.

tiles.title: Cloud
tiles.text: Develop Cloud based applications like chatbots, helper robots or virtual workmates. I prefer the IBM cloud, Watson technologie, Google Cloud and Nore-Red for these works.
